content: eleven iconic granny squares join together in this modern nod to the classic motif a perfect quick and portable project you ll find the halcyon bag just the right size for your essentials a sturdy strap guarantees your cargo will be well-supported in this pattern you ll get to practice crocheting a traditional granny square motif reverse single_crochet to join the squares and a fun romanian cord technique to make the strong strap use up some fun scraps or stick to one solid color throughout for a more unified look >>> and be sure to check out the coordinating halcyon bucket hat crochet pattern to complete the look <<< this ad-free printable pdf includes the full written patterns as well as detailed photo tutorials and links to video tutorials for some of the techniques used you ll need approximately 250 grams of worsted weight category 4 cotton yarn to complete this pattern in the following amounts color a approx 80 g color b approx 88 g color c approx 82 g this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew skill level - beginner sizing/measurements - 12 5 at tallest point 15 at widest point strap length is adjustable downloading - this listing is for the halcyon granny square bag crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind return policy - as this is a digital product i do not offer returns more info https //makeanddocrew com/granny-square-bag-crochet-pattern
